description: A web page for AP Statistics Unit 9 (Inference for Slopes), providing learning resources, a structured learning flow, an interactive flowchart, a prompt for an AI assistant (Grok), and study materials with progress tracking.

head.title: AP Statistics Unit 9: Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes

inlineStyles.purpose: Pulse animation and completed state styling (added via JS)

body.layout: Uses Tailwind CSS for styling. Main container is centered (`mx-auto`) with padding.

content.text: AP Statistics Unit 9: Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
Tools and guides to help you succeed in AP Statistics

tabNavigation.functionality: Clicking a tab button updates the 'active' class on buttons and corresponding content panels via JavaScript.

panels.purpose: Displays an interactive learning flow guide.
Displays a Mermaid flowchart illustrating the recommended learning process.
Provides the user with a prompt for the Grok AI assistant, instructions, and materials for the current study topic.

components.purpose: Instructions for using Grok with PDFs
Explanation of (+) icon for video backups
Displays details (name, description, PDF/video links) of the current topic.

components.functionality: Calls `markTopicAsCompleted()` for the current topic, updates state, and refreshes UI. Changes to 'Reset Progress' when all topics are done.

components.purpose: Displays small cards for all topics, showing status and providing quick access links.

panels.purpose: Lists all study topics with materials (PDFs, videos) and allows users to track their progress.

content.purpose: Explanation of (+) icon for video backups
Congratulatory message shown when all topics are completed.
Banner promoting the Grok Prompt tab.

components.purpose: Dropdown to jump to a specific topic card.

content.purpose: Container dynamically filled with topic cards.

globalVariables.name: grokPrompt
globalVariables.purpose: Text prompt for the Grok AI assistant.

globalVariables.name: pdfFiles
globalVariables.purpose: Core data structure holding information for each study topic (id, name, description, pdf/video links, completion status, current status).

coreFunctions.name: createTopicCard
coreFunctions.purpose: Generates HTML for a topic card based on data in `pdfFiles`.

coreFunctions.name: updateCurrentTopicInfo
coreFunctions.purpose: Updates #current-topic-info in the Grok Prompt tab.

coreFunctions.name: populateQuickAccessTopics
coreFunctions.purpose: Updates #quick-access-topics in the Grok Prompt tab.

coreFunctions.name: markTopicAsCompleted
coreFunctions.purpose: Updates topic status in `pdfFiles`, saves to localStorage, refreshes UI.

coreFunctions.name: resetProgress
coreFunctions.purpose: Resets completion status for all topics, saves, refreshes UI.

coreFunctions.name: saveTopicProgress
coreFunctions.purpose: Saves completion/current status from `pdfFiles` to localStorage.

coreFunctions.name: updateProgressBar
coreFunctions.purpose: Updates the visual progress bar based on completed topics.

coreFunctions.name: checkAllTopicsCompleted
coreFunctions.purpose: Checks if all items in `pdfFiles` are marked completed.

eventListeners.purpose: Initializes tabs, sets prompt text, loads progress, populates initial content based on active tab, sets up copy button and reset button.
Calls `markTopicAsCompleted()` for the current topic or `resetProgress()` if all done.
Scrolls to the selected topic card.
Sets the clicked topic as current.

localStorageUsage.purpose: To persist the completion and current status of study topics across sessions.

reactComponent.name: APStatLearningFlow
reactComponent.purpose: Provides a step-by-step interactive guide for the learning process.
reactComponent.structure: Progress tracker (steps), current step content (title, description, tips), static materials list, navigation buttons (Prev/Next).
